trans-unit.resname: PAL04·6 | Darksteel Ingot | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PAL04·6 | Darksteel Ingot | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

trans-unit.resname: PAL04·7 | Serum Visions | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PAL04·8 | Glacial Ray | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to any target.

trans-unit.resname: PAL04·8 | Glacial Ray | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)
trans-unit.target: Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

trans-unit.resname: PAL04·9 | Circle of Protection: Art | Card Name
PAL04·9 | Circle of Protection: Art | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose an artist.
trans-unit.target: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose an artist.

trans-unit.resname: PAL04·9 | Circle of Protection: Art | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{W}: The next time a source of your choice with art by the chosen artist would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
trans-unit.target: {1}{W}: The next time a source of your choice with art by the chosen artist would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

trans-unit.resname: PAL04·9 | Circle of Protection: Art | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {1}{W}: Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: {1}{W}: Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.

trans-unit.source: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, you draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, you draw three cards.

trans-unit.source: Statistically mind-staggering as it might seem, the term "mise" was in fact coined simultaneously by over one thousand Magic players.
trans-unit.target: Statistically mind-staggering as it might seem, the term "mise" was in fact coined simultaneously by over one thousand Magic players.

trans-unit.resname: PAL04·11 | Booster Tutor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Open a sealed Magic booster pack, reveal the cards, and put one of them into your hand. (Remove that card from your deck before beginning a new game.)
trans-unit.target: Open a sealed Magic booster pack, reveal the cards, and put one of them into your hand. (Remove that card from your deck before beginning a new game.)

trans-unit.source: Make your judgment wisely: The right pack will let you defeat your nemesis, but a poor choice can only end in torment. And *Homelands*.
trans-unit.target: Make your judgment wisely: The right pack will let you defeat your nemesis, but a poor choice can only end in torment. And *Homelands*.

trans-unit.resname: PAL04·12 | Goblin Mime | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: Mung noticed a few clouds gathering in the sky. Perhaps today he could perform his "walking against the wind" routine.
trans-unit.target: Mung noticed a few clouds gathering in the sky. Perhaps today he could perform his "walking against the wind" routine.

trans-unit.resname: PAL04·13 | Granny's Payback | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You gain life equal to your age.
trans-unit.target: You gain life equal to your age.

trans-unit.source: Few remember the exploits of Dakkon's grandmother, Eunice Blackblade.
trans-unit.target: Few remember the exploits of Dakkon's grandmother, Eunice Blackblade.

trans-unit.resname: PAL04·14 | Ashnod's Coupon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target player gets you target drink. You pay any costs for the drink.
trans-unit.target: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target player gets you target drink. You pay any costs for the drink.

trans-unit.source: Limited time offer. Void where prohibited. Limit one per purchase. Valid only in participating duels. This coupon is nontransferable and invalid if shattered, crumbled, detonated, pillaged, or otherwise disenchanted. Cash value less than 1/20 of a cent. Offer not valid in Quebec, Rhode Island, or where prohibited by law or the DCI.
trans-unit.target: Limited time offer. Void where prohibited. Limit one per purchase. Valid only in participating duels.
